issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Remove explicit panics
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9713](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9713). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are two explicit panics in the datafusion codebase. We should remove them.

comments.body:
